summary: Axena is a Shock Mage/One Handed follower available in base UNP, CBBE, & SeveNBase
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000][size=6][b]Lyrinthia's Axena Drakkon
[/b][/size][/color]
Based on Lyrinthia's Racemenu Preset Available [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80561/?]Here[/url]
Permission granted for follower creation by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/15764474/?]Lyrinthia[/url]


[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/opiy152x3/20161210211458_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Axena Drakkon
Race:  Custom Nord Based
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  50
Body:  Base UNP, CBBE, SeveNBase Options
Skin:  Fair Skin (Optimized)
Armor:  Hell Armour (Double Armor Stats)(SeveNBase Body Only)
Jewelry:  Various KS Jewelry
Weapons:  Liliths Lacerator & Her Hands
Location:  Riverwood - Gerdur's House

Class:  Combat Spellsword
Spells:  Healing Related; Shock Related

Levels with player.
Skill Bonuses:  All Magic, Light Armor, One Handed
Perk Trees:  Destruction, Restoration, Light Armor, One Handed

Tested with EFF & AFT
ENBs Pictured:  Vividian & RealVision

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8q0ahl6vb/20161210210840_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]
[b][u][color=#ff0000]Armor Version[/color]
[/u][/b]
BBP Compatible Skeleton (such as XPMSE)

[b][u][color=#ff0000]No Armor Version[/color]
[/u][/b]
No Known Requirements

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE

[/url]Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x7bptea6f/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/cuuirf5dz/Many_Thanks_To.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/15764474/?]Lyrinthia[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/yo3wnmccn/20161211011001_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/70kof7h1j/Q&A.png[/img]
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  It's Available [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80561/?]Here[/url]

Q:  Will you change *insert request here*?
A:  My apologies but this is not my character so I will not make changes to appearance.

Q:  What is the other armor pictured in some screenshots?
A:  All Variations of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80142/?]Hell Armour[/url]

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.
A:  I will probably refuse any little girl/boy looking follower requests though.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
